disclaimer: Disclaimer: I am not a certified architect or structural engineer. The following information is provided for informational purposes only and should be validated by a licensed professional before proceeding.

rooms.description: Spacious lobby that flows into the living room with open space for gatherings, designed in Bohemian style, featuring eclectic decor and warm lighting. The area is approximately 300 sqft.
A semi-open dining area adjacent to the living room, offering a bohemian ambiance with vibrant color accents and textured finishes. Approximately 150 sqft.

An open courtyard in the center of the apartment providing natural light, ventilation, and a serene environment. Features indoor plant arrangements and mosaic tiles that adhere to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance with large glass doors allowing ample natural light, designed according to local building norms and Vastu alignment.
Each bedroom has a dedicated balcony that overlooks the courtyard, promoting privacy and airflow. Balconies are integrated into the design ensuring compliance with safety regulations.
